data.message: Em please do an album calling out names and dissing today's rappers. World seriously needs it right about now

Agreed, mumble rap is fucking garbage.
He's too grown for that now. He has nothing to gain from doing that. Everything to lose.
It's not like we would understand any songs made in response now is it if em did do this, Let's say em slaughters migos on track lol, migos's reply would be like udda a mudda me adda in anna a moo 😂😂
He probably has an understanding and respect for the adaptation that mumble rapper have brought into rap like every other rapper has

It's not worth his time. These new guys are so many levels under guys like Eminem. They'll never have the success guys in Eminems time had. Those days are gone. Social media did that to rap. Every few years a new fad comes along gets big everyone doing it gets a record deal and when something else comes along those guys are dead. rap artists like Eminem they didn't have all of that. They all had to prove themselves with their skill as Lyricists and rappers. And they actually had to put in a lot of effort before someone would even consider them. That's why guys like Eminem are hundreds of levels higher then these dudes like Kodak, migos, and those goofy looking motherfuckers. Em isn't gonna stoop down to still be relevant because em will always be relevant he doesn't have to try.
